attributes.additional_details: Studies show that countries such as Hungary and Bulgaria allow illegal Non-Eu immigrants into the EU. Some of them are potentially terrorists and they drive across Europe and take the ferry across the channel.
attributes.background: The schengen area is an easy way for terrorists to enter the UK. Terrorists can travel without their passports being checked. Leave schengen NOW and so we can protect Britain from terrorists.

rejection.details: The UK is not part of the Schengen area and has not signed the Schengen agreement. It's therefore not clear what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
